alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:22AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wallace, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 100 AM MDT/200 AM CDT/... At 1221 AM MDT/121 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Goodland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Wallace, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
